I am getting back into using Quest again. I really want to make text adventures to go along with some of the music I make (I have a glitchy electronica project and a synthwave project). 

I tried to do it a bit with this game - http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/vpmuszdpjust1xrwkyoguq/creole-aeon

I found that embedded music made the game too slow to load (I ended up just using a small section of one track).

I was wondering if using music via web hosting will make games load faster. I am thinking of using a track for each room. 
Keen to hear your thoughts and advice before I start working on a new text adventure.
